response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us at $15,000. Given its worth to you is estimated at $10,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. Considering the high quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price not only reflects its value but also allows you to acquire it at a reasonable cost compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
